website_summaries.verdict: This triangular shade sail comes at a great price.
pros: With 4 size options ranging up to 20 feet per side, this triangular sail is great on its own or when paired with another shade sail
Made from 185 GSM HDPE woven fabric that is available in 7 colors and protects from 90% of harmful UV rays
cons: The fabric is on the thin side, and many customers reported that the listed colors are not accurate

customer_reviews.title: Simple answer to shade
customer_reviews.text: simple answer to a hot west facing door cover. Put gravel in a large pot with a post and attached other two ends to house. The triangle design sheds wind a lot better than a square. It keeps about 80% of the heat from a NM sun off you, a very clear difference. Rain tends to run to end if it's sloped enough. Has held up so far to 40 mph winds with no difficulty and has solid construction with rip stop fabric. Can combine with other triangles, shapes and colors if you are feeling creative. happy so far . A lot better than spending 6k on a pergola!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Boyce

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful stylish and affordable shade
customer_reviews.text: This shade sale worked perfectly to provide morning and afternoon shade and looks fabulous I like that the way the design looks, it was easy to install, and has held up to the monsoons of summer quite well. I am purchasing another one for the horse pen! Five stars
customer_reviews.author: Laura P.

customer_reviews.title: #FeelTheBreezeNotTheBurn
customer_reviews.text: You won't regret this purchase! Bought it for my daycare. My husband opted for quick release hardware because we see lots of winter and it made sense! We're not quite finished woth construction, but these are adorable so I had to post.
customer_reviews.author: hja1983

customer_reviews.title: What a deal
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect much when buying these for less than $30, but wow was I wrong. The quality is absolutely outstanding for this price. I expected to get something that will last me one summer down here in the south. It already withstood thunderstorms, hot sun and lots of rain. Based on what it held up against so far I think it'll last me at least 3 summers before I even need to think about replacing it.
customer_reviews.author: ja_ja

customer_reviews.title: Blocks the sun, cools the deck!
customer_reviews.text: I got these because we needed a way to quickly, make our deck habitable in the day time. The sun is killer out there. My husband rigged PVC poles with zip ties to the rails and we screwed the other side into the eaves. We were able to use the deck most of the day! Thrilled with this!
customer_reviews.author: Tinker65

customer_reviews.title: Great shade
customer_reviews.text: These sails are nice and big, and provide large sections of shade. We've had them up several weeks now. It's been quite breezy at times and a scorching hot summer. They are holding up well. We purchased them to provide shade over a Japanese maple tree and our swimming pool in the hot central California valley.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie D.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We love it! We are going to purchase one more shade to get even more coverage. The quality is great! Our patio depth is around 8 feet and width is 28 feet. These are 3 of the 12x12x12 (so you get an idea of the size you need).
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great Product Good Price
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this shade sail to shade a portion of our deck that has a due west exposure. This was easy to install along with another triangle shaped shade sail and works great. We can now actually use our deck most of the day and the shade is a lifesaver. Very Pleased ...Bruce in MD.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 5 year warranty?
customer_reviews.text: Although the fabric is rather lightweight, it seems to be quite strong and, overall, this shade sail is very nicely constructed. Another HUGE selling point for this product is the 5 year warranty. 5 years is a LOOOONG time for a shade sail. If it survives 3 years, I'll be happy. If it breaks down in a year, well, I'll be back here to update my review. I'm hoping for the best though. :-)
customer_reviews.author: P. Rey

customer_reviews.title: Update 2 Years Still Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is My Favorite of the 2 I bought. I Love the Color. Color held up pretty well after 11 months of having it up. I Love the Blue coming through my window. Update! I’ve Had this Shade 2 years and it’s Still Hanging.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie L.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these sails! Bought two... awesome shade, great material, nice color and size.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Shade Sails!!
customer_reviews.text: We Love our new shade sails!! They are very sturdy and look great!! Very well made and shipped super fast!
customer_reviews.author: TERESSA BURLESON

customer_reviews.title: Great profuct. Just wish they would include carabiner for ...
customer_reviews.text: Great profuct. Just wish they would include carabiner for each corner and tightner for each corner too! So far wearing well, wind, rain and yes snow! Late storm here in CO.
customer_reviews.author: David Boxall

customer_reviews.title: This product provides a great amount of shade during the hot summer days
customer_reviews.text: This product provides a great amount of shade during the hot summer days. It was very easy to install and the color is a nice accent to the house. I will be ordering another one to cover more of my patio
customer_reviews.author: Damion Delton

customer_reviews.title: This is my second order for these and they work ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second order for these and they work well and are very strong. I have had the first ones only four months but they took the wind and rain without getting damaged
customer_reviews.author: weaponx

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Easy to install. Suggest ordering the installation kit as well.
customer_reviews.text: We could not be happier with the results. We have scorching afternoon sun, in sunny California, that heats up our back bedrooms. We have shades but I don’t want to lose our view. We ordered one 20x20x20 and after installing loved it so much we added another. These are the perfect answer to our upstairs dilemma. Not only shading our upstairs but patio below as well. Super happy with this purchase. 😊
customer_reviews.author: En-Root

customer_reviews.title: Great quality Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great quality gives me good shade, no issues , love the color
customer_reviews.author: mcbjr62

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and color
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a gray shade sail, not the generic beige ones you see all over. This color looks good with my modern landscape and house. It was easy to install, but you should know that it is very difficult to measure these sails, they always seem to be larger than anticipated in spite of careful measurements. So if in doubt, get a bit smaller size. This has held up nicely to a scorching Arizona summer with a lot of monsoon high wind storms. Very happy, and at this price if it only lasted one season I'd be happy, but its end of summer and I'll easily get another season from it I think.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: This is great for back there
customer_reviews.text: Our house is Y shaped so we have a triangle back patio. This is great for back there. I have a hard time pulling it tight, but I'm also 8 months pregnant and pulling on something over my head is just hard these days. It does a great job of shading the patio as well as our baby room and guest room which has already saved us on our air-conditioning this year.
customer_reviews.author: E.A.

customer_reviews.title: NICE QUALITY/EASY INSTALL
customer_reviews.text: To provide a little shade over my pool Easy to install (especially since I happened to have support screws at the right locations) Used turnbuckles on two corners and a short bungee cable on the third. (Gives it some flexibility in the breeze ) I want another one but need an odd size
customer_reviews.author: Mickey C.

customer_reviews.title: Sun sails to the rescue
customer_reviews.text: We bought 5 of these to put out in our pool area. Our pool and gazebo face the south and gets really hot. I have put in tropical gardens back in that area in hopes of cooling the area down but the plants were burning up so we put up 2 sails in that area and 3 over the pool to keep the grandbabies from getting sunburned. We ended up taking 1 sail down over the pool because it cooled the water temp off and the kids were complaining. We kept the ones over the diving board and the steps area where they hang out all the time. It's made a huge difference in sunburns!
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: Saggy, baggy shade sail
customer_reviews.text: I used this product to as shade in my patio area. I watched several videos and read all about proper installation and with help, I installed it very tightly stretched, as directed. It’s been 4 weeks now and I’ve had to tighten it even further a few times due to the shade sail stretching out. It is sagging again and im ready to give up. I think maybe the sun may be damaging the fibers or something because it’s simply not staying taught. It’s past my return window so I guess I’m stuck with a saggy shade sail. Too bad. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: alexisg112

customer_reviews.title: After rain, wind, and shine...it still looks great
customer_reviews.text: This shade sail was easy to install with metal cables and a solid hardware set for shade sails. You will also need permanent structors to attach it to. Take your time, you will have to adjust each corner to get it right without any slack. This shade sail has taken three days to rain and 20 mph winds and looks exactly the same once the sun came out. The color keeps my backyard patio bright, but shaded if that makes any sense. Make sure you buy the right size leaving a few feet for stretching on each corner.
customer_reviews.author: H. Phan

customer_reviews.title: Great cost effective patio transformation.
customer_reviews.text: We totally love the way the sails have transformed our porch! We just put them up two days ago so we’ll see how they stand the test of time and weather, seems quite durable. Installation was more challenging than expected, probably because our patio is shaped a little weird, but the end result is totally worth it. If you’re thinking about buying these I’d totally suggest you do! However, I would highly suggest getting multiple extra turnbuckles and carabiners to have handy for installation. Our patio shape is unusual so we had to install a post to attach the ends of the sails- then I added lights and our patio is turning into a little outdoor paradise!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Kroon

customer_reviews.title: Did a great job shading my front porch and shade plants
customer_reviews.text: I used the red 12' triangle all summer in San Diego, California. Held up perfectly. Color, shape, etc. Used screw in hooks on 2 sides and one side was mounted to a tree with a zip tie. Did a great job keeping out the sun on my porch landing and providing some shade for the tropicals on my porch. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Tankersley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for backyard shade
customer_reviews.text: great for little ones playing in the backyard. This is just the right size to cover the sandbox. Our kids can play outside without worries of sunburn if they get out without their sunscreen on!.
customer_reviews.author: M D

customer_reviews.title: Bright colors, well made and good price too!
customer_reviews.text: I really like my shade sails. I was so pleased that I could get them in the blue and red colors as I already had a cream/white one. These are very well made and are holding up well with our summer monsoons. They arrived super fast which helped as I had summer plants to protect from the intense heats. Very good product and I though the price was very reasonable too.
customer_reviews.author: Jeephers

customer_reviews.title: Great shade. Looks nice
customer_reviews.text: We bought 3 for our back patio in southern California. It provides some nice shade and the color is great. We will definitely buy 2 more to complete the whole thing.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Looks durable and nice
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice and durable. Not enough rope for my install, but already had some. Only thing is I wish I went bigger, but didn’t realize they had a 20’x20’. Still love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great as a ghse shadecloth!
customer_reviews.text: I used this for a shade cloth in my ghse! So much prettier than a boring old shadecloth or the patio screen door I had on roof of ghse! It adds a touch of class and artwork to my ghse!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Begam

customer_reviews.title: I like it but...
customer_reviews.text: I like it but... I should have thought it through a little more. The blue looks like a FEMA tarp, I should have gotten another color. But it performs just fine. I put up two, slightly overlapping.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice and does provide a good shade!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it because my bbq is in a place where at noon time, when I most need, is on the direct sun exposure. The triangular shape enables me to leave the above of the bbq open, so the smoke can get out and still provides a shade for me. Easy to install, 3 cords only. And most importantly, looks nice and does not feel that the backyard is a closed space (which would defeat the purpose)
customer_reviews.author: Ed Besseler

customer_reviews.title: Using to reduce sun glaring on house
customer_reviews.text: We've rigged it up in our backyard over our pool and against our master bedroom. It's a nice way to reduce the sun glare and (hopefully) reduce a bit of the roasting on that side of the house. TBD how effective it will be when summer is in full force.
customer_reviews.author: Cortney

customer_reviews.title: The perfect solution.
customer_reviews.text: This shade has made our deck so much more usable in the summer heat. It has held up well to some rain and the breeze, though I do take it down in heavy storms. I like the fabric that allows light to pass through, very pleasant ambiance underneath. A bit tricky to install, but the nylon rope allowed for a little fudging on the placement of our d rings. Amazingly useful for the price. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Trina B.

customer_reviews.title: The colors they show a grossly off from what you actually get so buyer beware.
customer_reviews.text: its not the size they say because my posts are over 12 left apart but it doesn't spread the Sun shade.. you couldn't get any further off on color matches because this is white not send and it blinds the crap out of you with the sun shining on it? I took a picture of the item and of their color palette that they're deceiving buyers with.. the colors do not match so buyer beware!!
customer_reviews.author: Charles Chuckie Santos II

customer_reviews.title: Great Tarps for the Pation
customer_reviews.text: Great item, adds shade and is very attractive over the sitting area. I installed two. Love the outcome.
customer_reviews.author: Henry N Smith

customer_reviews.title: Ahhh, shade :-)
customer_reviews.text: Takes the temperature out on the deck down (it gets hot here in Central Florida!) and in turn stops the heat blazing back up into the den windows, in turn keeps the den cooler. Win, Win. Great product, sturdy and attractive. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: DBvinal

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I bought the white sail and it looks really nice. It may be obvious, but the lighter colored sails pass more light - it is a bit brighter underneath than I expect. I really wanted a Right Triangle (why are these not readily available?) so I rolled one edge to bring one of the corners to a 90 degrees. Then I pinned that in place. I'll update this post if the intense California sun damages this sail prematurely.
customer_reviews.author: An_Engineer_&_Designer

customer_reviews.title: Best value for great shade
customer_reviews.text: I use this shade to cover my sun shy garden plants. They get enough sun to thrive without burning in the 100+ weather. This shade actually provides reduced sunlight, not like those super cheap ones that are basically just netting that lets full sun inbetween. Great value. I may order another to expand my garden.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent G.

customer_reviews.title: We love them!
customer_reviews.text: It took us many hours over a few weeks to get these just the way we wanted them but we love the result. We have 2 measuring 16.5’ on each side and 1 that is 12’. We used heavy duty bungee cords along with hardware to connect between our house, a tree and a post we cemented into the ground. We used the longest bungees and then little by little cinched and tightened up to the smallest size where we could. We will replace the burgees as needed between seasons as I’m sure they’ll wear out.
customer_reviews.author: redngreen

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Looks nice. Hoping it tightens up just a little but provides the shade we need for one tricky spot in our yard. Anxious for it to rain to see if it gives any protection at all even though it says not waterproof. Serves the purpose great at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Artgirl

customer_reviews.title: Faded
customer_reviews.text: The color was not real vibrant to start with but after having it up only a couple months it faded to the point that it is no longer looking good. I'm sad as we went to a lot of work and expense to properly install and anchor it to our back yard. The quality was decent for the price but not looking good for more than a month or so, was a big disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: mom98wmu

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: It looks great and was easy to install. True charcoal color. Bought one and liked it so much bought another and they look great and provide shade but filtered for the catio and plants. Looks so much better than an umbrealla.Time will tell how long it lasts. Very happy with the purchase at this point.
customer_reviews.author: cua

customer_reviews.title: Shady days ahead
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my backyard. Now it’s cooler in the mornings and I have more shade from the sun during afternoons. Easy to install and made from durable fabric. Just needed to buy additional hardware for the install coz the item didn’t come with it. Overall, I love this product and glad I made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: insong

customer_reviews.title: LIARS!! measurements are inaccurate!!!
customer_reviews.text: Completely inaccurate measurement. I was 2 hours and damaged alot of facia trying to get this thing up. For one, it's not a 90 degree and two, it's not 16'5" on two sidea when pulled straight. It's more like 17' 8". It's as if these mouth breathers didn't realize that they need to put the "installed" measurements. I hate when companies like this get to continue selling misleading products. Amazon used to monitor stuff like this better. Shame on you.
customer_reviews.author: virgil perry

customer_reviews.title: Worked better than we had hoped
customer_reviews.text: I initially ordered one to see if it would work for temporary shade for a community moorage party. It arrived earlier than expected and I immediately ordered two more. They gave us the perfect amount of shade and the quality of the fabric is exceptional.
customer_reviews.author: Ed V

customer_reviews.title: Made in China, returning.
customer_reviews.text: Likes: Seems well made, nice color (rust), good product overall. Dislikes: Made in China (standard consumer information that should be disclosed). Returning. Looking for a different country of origin and a better shape for our needs (less leggy).
customer_reviews.author: RK

customer_reviews.title: Very dirty sand.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't put it up yet, I did open it and it FEELS fairly thick and "sturdy", in all honesty I DON'T LIKE the color at all, I believe I ordered the "sand" color...I grew up on the beach and this doesn't look like any sand I've seen, the sand they used musta been very dirty sand...very mucky dirty sand.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Rose

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for Shade and Privacy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to increase the privacy and provide some shade. Color is vibrant, has not faded and the loops are well stitched. The sail also has faired well in winds, thunderstorms, monsoon rain and the brutal heat of Vegas. Shade is wonderful and one can definitely feel the temperature difference from full sun to being under this sail. The look and feel compliments our pool area and will certainly be purchasing an additional one.
customer_reviews.author: VHC Media

customer_reviews.title: Came back and bought more
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought a couple of these for the nightclub he manages. After buying one he came back and bought more because he was really impressed with them. So far so good they have held up. I will write an update after the summer months to see how the quality has held up.
customer_reviews.author: JCQLYN

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with size, quality is much more than expected is not showing any signs of weathering from all day sun or daily dropping of seasonal figs that use to be near misses from landing on someone's head or lap let alone all over the patio from squirrels jumping branch to branch and us picking up all day. Now they gather on the sail and are guided into bucket.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Very small
customer_reviews.text: Very small beware, barely enough to cover one person sitting on a chair, go for a larger size. Quality like a tarp. Also beware, if wrong size shipping cost a 1/4 of price of shade, so if you buy plan on keeping. They won't take back.
customer_reviews.author: Maryb

customer_reviews.title: Great shade
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect! It was a two person instal for us as we have it over one end of the pool. Great shade, has weathered well enduring much rain & intense sun here in Florida. I bought the stainless steel hardware.. wish that was included.
customer_reviews.author: GWF

customer_reviews.title: Great solution to the Florida sun!
customer_reviews.text: Well I just had to take this down thanks to Hurricane Dorian heading our way (super easy take down by the way), but it's been great to block out the sun on my back patio. I had a concrete slab but since I'm moving within the next year I didn't want to get anything crazy expensive like a pergola for shade, but needed something. This is a great inexpensive solution. Hoping to get this back up soon!
customer_reviews.author: Nina Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I recommend buying the tension kit and also I had to buy metal wire for longevity. They give you string, but that will only work for so long. It is a great product and it looks like the picture. Shipping was pretty fast too!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie B

customer_reviews.title: Lovely sun shade, very functional!
customer_reviews.text: We love this small size triangle sun shade in our back yard. We have a small area up against the house that is pretty to sit in and watch the birds, but a little hot in the afternoons. This sun shade cools the area down significantly, and not we can have some potted plants there also and they don't cook in the sun. Very happy with this!
customer_reviews.author: Karen A. Parker

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this to anyone the price is great
customer_reviews.text: I really like the material on my new sunshade my neighbors had it in different colors so I thought I would order one and I'm glad I did I'm a very happy camper I also Introduced my mom and dad to it then they also bought one which was a blue color will continue by in these in the future...
customer_reviews.author: MRS NATASHA. H

customer_reviews.title: Great sun screen
customer_reviews.text: Here in Baja Mx we get plenty of sun, but for a shade screen you will not find any better than these, heavy stitching nicely finished edges and some tie down cords, Could not imagine any better. will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Bajasparky

customer_reviews.title: High quality with low cost
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had this up for about a month now and it has withstood our crazy winds and gives us just enough coverage but not block all of the sun. The color is perfect to let the light come through.
customer_reviews.author: Dalena S Baker

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: We bought one then ordered a second one for interest and coverage. We actually have received compliments on the look of these. We have had these for about a year. Some fading but of course that's expected in full sun in Texas. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mollieisms

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer
customer_reviews.text: If you're like me and can't stand direct sun you need this. I didn't have posts installed so I had to get creative and use my nearest trees and longer rope. The tension springs still make them very taught desite the extra distance I have. Love sitting on the deck now. I needed three to fit decent coverage for about 15ft.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Not sure how long it will last
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shade a couple of weeks ago, and through all the crazy California weather, I finally had a chance to set t up. Unfortunately, it looks like it probably won’t last thru the summer.
customer_reviews.author: K. Givo

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: We needed a sail to block out the summer sun Coming from the west side. The size I got was a bit too large, but it worked out great. I immediately felt the temperature difference being behind the sail - much cooler on the shaded side! Will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Monica Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Order the hardware, beautiful Sail Shade!
customer_reviews.text: Although not up yet, I did pull this out and opened it and it appears to be very durable, not too heavy for a 59 yr old woman to install. I do find it a lot bigger than I expected it to be. It’s also a pretty color tan with specks of other colors and bit of glitter. I should mention that it isn’t hung because I did not order the hardware. I can’t wait to set it up, and can add a picture! Order the hardware if you are ordering this Sail Shade!
customer_reviews.author: MAF

customer_reviews.title: Not RED
customer_reviews.text: Just be aware that if you are looking for bright red, this is not it. It is brownish-rust color. Could be very pretty in someone's yard but I wanted red so I returned it. Also - it has the feeling of a camping tarp - not like fabric, in case that's what you are expecting. Happy shopping!
customer_reviews.author: Darby Shields Ciampi

customer_reviews.title: Provided Much Needed Shade to My Backyard
customer_reviews.text: I had a difficult time finding a creative solution to the lack of shade in my backyard, luckily these guys came in handy. They provided shade and looked elegant as well.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Great for shade and cover from falling leaves!
customer_reviews.text: Great covers! We have a pond in the backyard and bought two to cover the pond from leaves falling into it and getting it dirty. It provides shade and will keep our pond cleaner. Easy to install and they look durable! Shipped within 2 days! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Cesar Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Nice color but
customer_reviews.text: 12 by 12 by 12 sounds big but it is built more like a thong then a triangle, so the coverage, the patch of shade you get is kind of puny. Think about whether you'd rather just use a tarp.
customer_reviews.author: Ijw

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this up for almost 2 months now and had a hand full of strong storms with high winds come through and it has held up great! Not a tear in it at all. It was easy to put up and allows the water to flow through it while giving the shade I wanted over top the grandson's pool. Shipping was fast and the price was good.
customer_reviews.author: ANDREW Z

customer_reviews.title: Burns from the sun, very dangerous!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money. Barely covers anything and the sun burned right through it. It might have lit the whole thing on fire if I didn’t notice the smoke smell and took it down.
customer_reviews.author: Seda

customer_reviews.title: Wow, Amazing
customer_reviews.text: As I just got it I can not say how long it will last but I am guess a very long time. It is a beautiful and very well made sail
customer_reviews.author: jo

customer_reviews.title: Bought a second!
customer_reviews.text: Great durable fabric that provides good shade. Would not use the strings they provide to hang it though! Get carabiners and eyebolts instead! Good sail for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great Price Great Product
customer_reviews.text: A very well made reasonably priced shade sail for the south side of our home. Handles wind well. Had to tighten a couple times but now is stable. Really like it.
customer_reviews.author: PTS

customer_reviews.title: Good shade!
customer_reviews.text: We love it but it’s a little small. My husband bought it to shade him when he’s grilling. It does the job and it’s not bulky or cumbersome.
customer_reviews.author: T Kong

customer_reviews.title: Nice material, fast shipping!!
customer_reviews.text: We love it! The color is perfect, sturdy and easy to set up. It arrived in one day, on Sunday! We enjoy staying under. We didn't have shade anymore, because we took down our big silver maple, :( Having this Triangle sail is helping.
customer_reviews.author: C. C.

customer_reviews.title: Strong sails and worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: Hung this over my deck. No extra hooks but we got them at the local hardware store. Glad the instructions came with pictures of what other hardware to get. We had to get wire also to connect as the sails had to be connected to posts that was outside of the dimensions. We had a rainstorm come through and it held up even with strong winds and breathable to where rain didn’t collect and weigh it down. Very pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: M. Yang

customer_reviews.title: It's great!
customer_reviews.text: Its great and totally matches the one l purchased at Homedepot 2 years ago. And it has no tears nor has it faded in 2 years of sun,wind and weather.
customer_reviews.author: kathleen Trevino

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shade in AZ
customer_reviews.text: This has helped so much in our AZ home blocking the afternoon sun. I'm bummed the price went up so much since I ordered because we would love a 2nd one to cover our kids playground.
customer_reviews.author: Kymber

customer_reviews.title: great cover/shade for Small patios!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our small patio we have and it worked out great! Just remember to buy Anchors or hooks to mount it up with!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Great, just a little larger than expected
customer_reviews.text: I like the color but the sails are a little larger than the stated size. I replaced old sails (same size on package) with these, they are larger so they sag a bit. Quality seems good, color is nice, just wish they were a little tighter for my application. Would still buy them, just a heads up on actual size!
customer_reviews.author: L Maccagno

customer_reviews.title: Size is inacurate
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these a year ago and it was all faded and molded so I replaced it with a new one. The description says 12 x 12 x 12 it is not it’s more like 12 x 9 1/2 x 10. Also the color is not tan or beige it is gold
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not too sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The screen tore a hole within 2-3 days of putting up. Winds were not to strong but still managed to tear the shade screen. I don not recommend for anywhere that may have moderate to heavy winds. Also the angled triangle was very awkward and uneven to put up.
customer_reviews.author: priscilla

customer_reviews.title: very durable
customer_reviews.text: 3 years now and still going strong! We have had hail snow and 90 MPH winds including a microburst and this has held up. We have bought 4 and adding another and told all of our friends about them. We had a freak snow storm in late May last year and it was a wet snow. I kept knocking the snow off but overnight it got to be 3" of buildup and no issues! We frequently get hail and no issues Love these things.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: The sail it’s very sturdy it’s been install at the sun and rain daily and offer great shade. Also the price was great and the shipping was quick
customer_reviews.author: david santiago

customer_reviews.title: Great idea for adding shade anywhere!
customer_reviews.text: Relatively straight forward to hang them. I used a combination of the house fascia and trees for anchor points so to get the tension correct on all 3 sides was the hardest part. But really about what you’d expect. Bought 2 more.
customer_reviews.author: Alee Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought and returned 3 different sets of shades and these are perfect! Glad I finally found some that work and are as described
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette

customer_reviews.title: If it can last in Florida it can last anywhere. Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I have a spot on the side of my house that is sun ALL DAY. This shade is perfect. It’s lasted through tropical force winds, an entire heavy rainy season, and the bright hot sun of Florida.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Z.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t sure if it will look good but it turned out amazing! Gives enough shade without taking away sunlight from the backyard.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Casey

customer_reviews.title: They do the job! Shade!
customer_reviews.text: We needed to create shade in our backyard. Ended up buying multiple shades. They seem well constructed. We are pleased with them.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: It’s nice. It held up in a 77 MPH wind gust from a storm. Its a woven material which allows water and filtered sunlight through. I plan on getting another to go along side this to get more coverage area
customer_reviews.author: SLB

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t shrink
customer_reviews.text: It works great to add shade on my deck in the afternoon, and also add some privacy. The instructions said it would shrink, but it hasn’t and it’s been up for a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: We mounted this shade over the shallow part of our swimming pool. It works great and gives the pool some shade for most of the day. It does hold some water if it rains hard, even though it eventually drips through. I recommend mounting it on some angle to help the water drain off more quickly.
customer_reviews.author: HS

customer_reviews.title: works great! looks even better.
customer_reviews.text: awesome a must have for sunny states. helps with ran as well. has stood up to a year of colorado punishment including about a foot of snow. forgot it was up. it could be 70 and sunny 1 minute here and dumping snow the next. no joke happens all the time.
customer_reviews.author: jerrad

customer_reviews.title: Go a size larger if you want more coverage.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item to cover my 16ft above ground pool. Although it measures 16'5" in all 3 directions, it only covered the middle of the pool. Leaving too much open space for the sun to heat the water and eat up my chlorine tablets!! Otherwise, this is a good choice for a smaller area of sun coverage!
customer_reviews.author: CCSimon

customer_reviews.title: Works well and Black good amount of light
customer_reviews.text: Install was a bit off I didn’t allow enough space between tie downs, that was my mistake, it works great blocks the sun better than I expected
customer_reviews.author: Manny

customer_reviews.title: Sand color is really Gold
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 4 stars only because the 'sand' color is actually more of a gold - just wanted other people to know! I just returned and ordered the brown color, but apparently, my neighbor did the same thing. Doh!
customer_reviews.author: B. Ohanlon

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this shade sail! Perfect size, durable, and pleasing to the eye. It does the trick, and gives me the shade I needed. It was pretty easy to put up too. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: RBG

customer_reviews.title: Ok for price, but not great.
customer_reviews.text: The “giving” nylon rope x 3 were to short. The nylon rope is so slippery that you’ll need to buy a separate installation kit. Ie. the metal hooks and attachments advertised. Our nylon ropes started coming apart on day 1. We tried contacting the seller about the issue and no response. We’ll be returning.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Cool product
customer_reviews.text: Made very well, sturdy,easy to install looks amazing up. Provides plenty of shade & it is water resistant.
customer_reviews.author: Gunny Girl

customer_reviews.title: Limited heat blockage
customer_reviews.text: Pleased with quality. Went up easily using pulleys. Only issue was the color. It was as offered, but a white or lighter color would reduce the heat under the triangle. We used these for special events and found that white canopies were much cooler. That being said, we're discussing purchasing more.
customer_reviews.author: James Brown

product_meta.title: LOVE STORY 12' x 12' x 12' Triangle Sand Sun Shade Sail Canopy UV Block Awning for Outdoor Patio Garden Backyard
feature_bullets: Made of 100% 185GSM New HDPE (high density polyethylene) material--No recycled materials used, more healthy and safe. The breathable fabric allows cool breezes and light to pass through for better airy and comfortable space, so the canvas isn’t waterproof
90% Shading rate and protect against up to 95% harmful UV rays. Perfect for gardens, patios, swimming pools, bbq areas or other outdoor area

Curved sides to enhance pull strength and prevent drooping, so the actual shading area would shrink slightly, tolerance 4~6 inches for each side. You could install different shade sails of different colors and sizes to get a larger shading area

Please measure the size of the installation area accurately before purchasing. Leave 1.5-2 foot space for the hardware kit between D ring and fixing points, all edges are finished slightly curved so it can be stretched tightly.It can be used for 5 years under normal usage and normal weather conditions.

Stainless steel D ring on each edge and 3*4.9FT long durable ropes are strongly guarantee fastness of installation. It is recommended to install the shade sail with hardware kit that's sold separately in our shop.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars2,033 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
